sentences.sContent: In the service of the empress, this inept chauffeur faced no legal sanction for the mishap.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the service of the empress, this inept chauffeur faced no legal sanction for the mishap.
sentences.sCn: 由于服侍太后，这位无能的司机在这场车祸中没有受到任何法律的制裁。

sentences.sContent: For example, chauffeur Pande said he wants his two children to acquire skills that will help them do better jobs than driving.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example, chauffeur Pande said he wants his two children to acquire skills that will help them do better jobs than driving.
sentences.sCn: 例如，作为司机的潘德说，他希望他的两个孩子能学到技术，让他们找到比司机更好的工作。

sentences.sContent: His main job was guarding Dodi, acting as his chauffeur, bodyguard and dogsbody.
sentences.sContent_eng: His main job was guarding Dodi, acting as his chauffeur, bodyguard and dogsbody.
sentences.sCn: 他的主要工作是保护多迪，当多迪的司机、保镖和勤杂工。

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to drive a car for someone else
to drive a car for someone as your job
